definitions.text: an adornment consisting of a strip of a contrasting color or material
a piece of braid, usually on the sleeve, indicating military rank or length of service
V-shaped sleeve badge indicating military rank and service
examples: they earned their stripes in Kuwait
businessmen of every stripe joined in opposition to the proposal

definitions.text: a narrow marking of a different color or texture from the background
examples: a green toad with small black stripes or bars
may the Stars and Stripes forever wave
